name: Pony World 3
description: Third installment to the very successful Pony World series features improved gameplay, cartoony 3D graphics and whole new, bigger and better Pony Town to explore, live in and form relationships. Socialize with other ponies, play with them and meet your beloved one.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Core 2 Duo 1.8GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 9600GT or better w /256MB vram DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatble
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB GeForce GTS 450 or Radeon equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatble
